Item.desc: HP stealing moves restore double HP. Cannot be used by Trainers.
+2 to Speed Evasion. Cannot be used by Trainers.
The user rolls +2d6 during the Introduction Stage of a Contest. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Tough Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Cool Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Cute Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Smart Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
When held, once per Contest, the holder may re-roll any 1s made when using a Beauty Move. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Evolution is prevented for the holder. Cannot be used by Trainers.
The user does not take damage from Sandstorm. Head Item for Trainers.
The Holder's Speed is halved, and any immunity to Ground Type is lost. Hand Item for Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
The Lagging Items are tied to a specific Stat. When held, they set that Stat to -4 Combat Stages. Cannot be used by Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
The holder is immune to Moves with the Powder Keyword. Accessory or Head Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Fighting-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Dark-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Fire-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.

When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Electric-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Steel-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers. Can be used by Onix and Scyther to evolve.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Grass-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.
When held, it grants a +5 Damage Bonus to all direct damage Water-Type Moves performed by the user. Accessory Item for Trainers.

A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Blue Shards are associated with Water, Ice, and Flying types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Green Shards are associated with Bug, Grass, and Ground types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Red Shards are associated with Fire, Fairy, and Psychic types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Yellow Shards are associated with Electric, Rock, and Steel types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Orange Shards are associated with Normal, Fighting, and Dragon types.
A bit of colored energized crystal used for various crafting purposes. Violet Shards are associated with Poison, Dark, and Ghost types.
Increases the Pokemon's Attack by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Defense by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Special Attack by two Combat Stages
Increases the Pokemon's Special Defense by two Combat Stages

Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points.
Snack. Grants a Digestion Buff that heals 5 Hit Points. May be used as Bait
Snack. When their Digestion Buff is traded in, the user recovers 1/16th of their max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.

Poison-Type Pokemon may consume the Black Sludge as a Snack Item; when the Digestion Buff is traded in, they recover 1/8th of their Max Hit Points at the beginning of each turn for the rest of the encounter.
Heals 25 Hit Points - Repulsive
Cure all Persistent Status Afflictions - Repulsive

Lasts 2 hour; causes Pokemon of level 25 or lower to flee

While worn, Attack is +2 Combat Stages instead of 0. However, the user is Suppressed and cannot be cured until the end of Combat, even if the item is removed. Cannot be used by Trainers.
While worn, Special Attack is +2 Combat Stages instead of 0. However, the user is Suppressed and cannot be cured until the end of Combat, even if the item is removed. Cannot be used by Trainers.
While worn, Speed is +2 Combat Stages instead of 0. However, the user is Suppressed and cannot be cured until the end of Combat, even if the item is removed. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Whenever the holder deals Super Effective Damage, they deal an additional 5 damage (this damage is not multiplied). Accessory Item for Trainers.
Induces burn on holder. Off-Hand Item for Trainers. Standard Action to drop.
Attacks cause Flinch on a roll of 19+. This does not stack with any abilities, moves, or effects that extend flinch rate. Head Item for Trainers. Can be used by Slowpoke and Poliwhirl to evolve.
The holder gains the Stall ability. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Snorlax to be able to produce a Munchlax Egg
When held, it grants +1 Bonus to all Accuracy Rolls. A roll of 1 always misses. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Chansey and Blissey to be able to produce a Happiny Egg
When held, it grants +1 to all Stat Evasions. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Wobbuffet to be able to produce a Wynaut Egg
When held, it grants +2 to the Damage Base of Psychic-Type Move. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Mr. Mime to be able to produce a Mime Jr. Egg
When held, The user cannot be Slowed, Stuck, or Trapped.The user does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity by Shifting. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Chimecho to be able to produce a Chingling Egg
When held, it grants +2 to the Damage Base of Rock-Type Moves. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes SudoWoodo to be able to produce a Bonsly Egg
When held, it grants +2 to the Damage Base of Grass-Type Moves. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Roselia and Roserade to be able to produce a Budew Egg
When held, it grants +2 to the Damage Base of Water-Type Moves. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Maril and Azumaril to be able to produce a Azurill Egg
When held, it grants +2 to the Damage Base of Water-Type Moves. Cannot be used by Trainers. Causes Mantine to be able to produce a Mantyke Egg
Whenever the holder deals direct damage, increase the damage by +5, and then the holder loses Hit Points equal to 1/16th of their Max Hit Points. Off-Hand Item for Trainers.
The holder's damaging attacks have their Critical Hit Range extended by +1. Can be used by Sneasel to evolve.
The holder's damaging attacks cause an Injury on a roll of 19+. Accessory Item for Trainers. Can be used by Gilgar to evolve.

A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. The stone has a fiery orange heart.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of clear water.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has an unmistakable leaf pattern.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It holds shadows as dark as can be.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.
An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines with a faint pink and raises the holder's Sp. Def stat.
An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a sharp silver and raises the holder's Sp. Atk stat.
Boosts the power of Dragon-type moves by 10% when held. Can be used by Seadra to evolve.
A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown. Can be used by Porygon2 to evolve.
A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Electabuzz to evolve.
A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Magmar to evolve.
A mysterious scale that causes Feebas to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.
A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Rhydon to evolve.
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Dusclops to evolve.
A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Spritzee to evolve.
A transparent device somehow filled with all sorts of data. It was produced by Silph Co. Can be used by Porygon to evolve.
A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped and whirled cream. It's loved by a certain Pokemon. Can be used by Swirlix to evolve.
A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokemon evolve. It's as round as a Pokemon Egg. Can be used by Happiny to evolve.
This tiny rainbow scale from a Luvdisc is valued by Apothecary Researchers, because it can be used to create the Heart Booster vitamin.

-20 Modifier if the target is under half the level your active Pokémon is.
-20 Modifier if the target was baited into the encounter with food.
-20 Modifier if the target evolves with an Evolution Stone.
A caught Pokémon will start with +1 Loyalty.
-30 Modifier if the user has an active Pokémon that is of the same evolutionary line as the target, and the opposite gender.
-5 Modifier for each Weight Class the target is above 1.
-20 Modifier if the target has a Movement Capability above 7.
-20 Modifier if you already own a Pokemon of the target’s species.
-5 to the Modifier after every round since the beginning of the encounter, until the Modifier is -20.
.20 Modifier if the target is under level 10.
-20 Modifier, if the target is Water or Bug type.
-20 Modifier, if the target was found underwater or underground.
A caught Pokemon is easily pleased and starts with a raised happiness.
A caught Pokemon will heal to Max HP immediately upon capture.
+5 to Modifier after 1 round of the encounter, +10 to Modifier after round 2, +20 to modifier after round 3.
-20 Modifier if it is dark, or if there is very little light out, when used.

A toy that attracts the attention of a Pokemon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokemon.

Only affects not-fully-evolved Pokemon of a single family, decided when the Eviolite is made. Grants a +5 Bonus to two different Stats, after Combat Stages, decided when the Eviolite is made. Prevents Pokemon from evolving when held. Cannot be used by Trainers.
Whenever the user faints, roll 1d20. Once a Scene on a result of 16+, the holder does not faint, and is left with 1 Hit Point. Accessory Item for Trainers.
Once a Scene, if damage from a Move would take Focus Sash's holder's Hit Points from Max to 0 or less, Focus Sash's holder instead has 1 Hit Point remaining. Accessory Item for Trainers.

Comes with a remote activator, which when pressed, causes the Pokemon or Trainer wearing the shock collar to lose Hit Points equal to 1/6th of their Max Hit Points. This may be used to activate the �Press� Feature. This collar works on Ground-Type Pokemon.
